name: Rubblar
description:
Time to grab everything you can! 

Check out the downloadable versions for higher visual fidelity 👇

Controls
  • Move the mouse to move the hand.
  • Left click to grab things.
  • Right click to retract the arm.
Credits

A game by:

  • Tibo
  • Sander

With assets from:

  • EminYILDIRIM: Stretch sounds
  • vlammenos: Long police sire sound
  • TurtleLG: Jail door sound
  • Juan_Merie_Venter: Bounce sound
  • jayfrosting: Cheering people sound
  • egomassive: Short police siren sound

Created for the 20 Second Game Jam.
